emails.subject: Marketing proposal
emails.body:
Dear Sandra,
Please find attached the initial marketing proposal for Q3 campaigns. Let me know your thoughts and any adjustments needed.
Best regards,
Mark

emails.subject: Re: Marketing proposal
emails.body:
Hi Mark,
Thanks for the proposal. It looks promising but I think we need more focus on social media. Please revise and send the update.
Regards,
Sandra

emails.subject: Re: Marketing proposal
emails.body:
Sandra,
I've updated the plan with expanded social media strategies and budget reallocations. See the new draft attached.
Cheers,
Mark

emails.subject: Feedback on revised proposal
emails.body:
Mark,
The revisions look good. Please prepare a final version including KPIs and timelines.
Thanks,
Sandra

emails.subject: Fwd: Feedback on revised proposal
emails.body: Forwarding Sandra's feedback. Let's discuss in today's huddle.\n- Analyst
